data.narrative: At 10:43 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava sits up in bed, the city lights filtering through the blinds casting stripes across the room. A wave of disorientation washes over her as she tries to remember why she's awake so late. The digital alarm clock on her nightstand glows softly, displaying the time, a stark reminder of the late hour. She takes a moment to collect her thoughts, deciding to prioritize figuring out her work schedule for tomorrow and grabbing a glass of water to clear the fogginess.

data.narrative: At 10:43 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava pads barefoot into the kitchen, the cool tile floor a stark contrast to the warmth of her bed. The faint hum of the refrigerator fills the otherwise quiet apartment. City lights stream in through the window above the sink, illuminating the stainless steel appliances and the small collection of travel mugs on the counter. She's made her way to the Kitchen.

data.narrative: At 10:43 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava quickly locates a clean glass in the cabinet above the sink. The cool water rushes out, filling the glass. She takes a long drink, the water immediately making her feel a bit more awake. The cloudy weather outside mutes the usual city glow, leaving the kitchen in a softer light.
